matching_annotations_instructions.message: The following templates have been defined for this page. You can edit an existing one or create a new one.

no_matching_annotations_instructions.message: There are no elements already annotated in this page. Please, create a new template by annotating this document.

example_acronym.message: e.g. Amazon Books, Youtube Trailer, etc.

name_the_template.message: Please, name the concept you want to annotate in this page with a domain-specific concept. Then, choose a tag for it.

service_name_already_exists.message: This name is already taken by another service

results_selection_instructions.message: Please, click on the «main page element» which contains all the properties of the concept you are interested to annotate. Finally, choose the number of occurrences of the concept.

results_properties_instructions.message: Click on each of the properties you want to be considered for your template, and give them a name.

props_are_required.message: It is mandatory to define at least one property, since it is the information that will be retrieved when you use the template for harvesting the concrete information in the page.

no_results_found.message: No results found for the specified selection

end_of_process_message.message:
You just created the template

Now you can use it by navigating similar structured pages on this site and pressing the «harvesting» button.

You can also edit this template by opening this sidebar when you are browsing this page.
